text: The absolutely best pizza and cheese sticks. I got the best deal and my pizza was ready in ten minutes. Very friendly and helpful staff.

name: Ashley Holliday
text: Great service! A big shout out to Jennifer and the rest of the crew for being so fast, friendly and courteous. Vernon, Alabama has by far the best Pizza Hut we have ever eaten at. The toppings taste fresh and and the staff go above and beyond. Thanks again for another great supper!
